steps.description: We discuss your challenges and goals. If I think I can help, and you like what you hear, we move on.
The team and I workshop a current challenge together. You get to know me, I learn about them, plus we deliver something of immediate value.
Synergy and team buy-in's crucial to success. If you decide to hire me as coach and consultant, great! If not, no problem.
If we decide to continue, I'll put together a tailored programme for ~1-3 months, focused on the most pressing team and business challenges.

steps.step: The team(s) and I get cracking.
steps.description: I work with the team. We regularly review progress against outcomes, with a rolling monthly contract available for peace of mind.
